tool_description: The Personal Quotes API provides Love Quotes, Life Quotes, Relationship Quotes, Motivational Quotes, Inspirational Quotes, Author Quotes, and many more.
name: The Personal Quotes
title: The Personal Quotes

api_list.name: GET quotes by tags
api_list.description: This endpoint provides multiple quotes (maximum 200)  from a tag along with its associated author.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://the-personal-quotes.p.rapidapi.com/quotes/tags/happiness"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "the-personal-quotes.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://the-personal-quotes.p.rapidapi.com/quotes/tags/{tags}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "the-personal-quotes.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: GET quotes by author
api_list.description: This endpoint provides multiple quotes (maximum 200) of an author along with the associated tags.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://the-personal-quotes.p.rapidapi.com/quotes/author/Stephen King"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "the-personal-quotes.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

print(response.json())

api_list.name: GET a random quote by an auther
api_list.description: This endpoint provides a random quote from an author along with its  associated tags.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://the-personal-quotes.p.rapidapi.com/quotes/random/author/Stephen King"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "the-personal-quotes.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: GET a random quote by tag
api_list.description: This endpoint provides a random quote from a tag along with its author's name and associated tags.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://the-personal-quotes.p.rapidapi.com/quotes/random/inspirational"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "the-personal-quotes.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
